body:
"Frost Raptor", "Adarkar Valkyrie", ...
now it throw Exception :

Exception from controller.runGame: No corresponding MagicType for Snow
java.lang.RuntimeException: No corresponding MagicType for Snow
	at magic.model.MagicType.getType(MagicType.java:38)
author: [neoedmund](https://code.google.com/u/neoedmund/)
title: Snow Creature

comments.body:
"Goblin Furrier","Creature - Goblin Warrior","Prevent all damage that Goblin Furrier would deal to snow creatures."

so "snow creature" should be a type I think.
comments.author: [neoedmund](https://code.google.com/u/neoedmund/)

comments.body:
Thanks for the report. Snow is indeed a super type. We've not gotten around to dealing with snow creature hence it was not in the program. I've added in all the current card types and super types in revision 616d2f6e619d

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
